entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
